author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all.
I noticed when trying to run the DeepCore workflow 11923.17 it was actually NOT running the DeepCore algorithm as the ` --procModifiers seedingDeepCore ` is not added to the cmsDriver command:

``` console
11923.17 2021PU_seedingDeepCore+QCD_Pt_1800_2400_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSim+DigiPU+RecoNanoPU+HARVESTNanoPU [1]: cmsDriver.py QCD_Pt_1800_2400_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi  -s GEN,SIM -n 10 --conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic --beamspot Run3RoundOptics25ns13TeVLowSigmaZ --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3 --relval 9000,50 
                                           [2]: cmsDriver.py step2  -s DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@relval2021 --conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW -n 10 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3 --pileup Run3_Flat55To75_PoissonOOTPU --pileup_input das:/RelValMinBias_14TeV/CMSSW_12_0_0_pre4-120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v2-v1/GEN-SIM
                                           [3]: cmsDriver.py step3  -s RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,RECOSIM,PAT,NANO,VALIDATION:@standardValidation+@miniAODValidation,DQM:@standardDQM+@ExtraHLT+@miniAODDQM+@nanoAODDQM --conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic --datatier GEN-SIM-RECO,MINIAODSIM,NANOAODSIM,DQMIO -n 10 --eventcontent RECOSIM,MINIAODSIM,NANOEDMAODSIM,DQM --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3 --pileup Run3_Flat55To75_PoissonOOTPU --pileup_input das:/RelValMinBias_14TeV/CMSSW_12_0_0_pre4-120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v2-v1/GEN-SIM
                                           [4]: cmsDriver.py step4  -s HARVESTING:@standardValidation+@standardDQM+@ExtraHLT+@miniAODValidation+@miniAODDQM+@nanoAODDQM --conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic --mc  --geometry DB:Extended --scenario pp --filetype DQM --era Run3 -n 10 --pileup Run3_Flat55To75_PoissonOOTPU --pileup_input das:/RelValMinBias_14TeV/CMSSW_12_0_0_pre4-120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v2-v1/GEN-SIM
```

#### PR validation:

After the change the command:

```console
 runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -nel 11923.17
```

returns:

```console
11923.17 2021PU_seedingDeepCore+QCD_Pt_1800_2400_14TeV_TuneCP5_GenSim+DigiPU+RecoNanoPU+HARVESTNanoPU [1]: cmsDriver.py QCD_Pt_1800_2400_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi  -s GEN,SIM -n 10 --conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic --beamspot Run3RoundOptics25ns13TeVLowSigmaZ --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3 --relval 9000,50 
                                           [2]: cmsDriver.py step2  -s DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@relval2021 --conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW -n 10 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3 --pileup Run3_Flat55To75_PoissonOOTPU --pileup_input das:/RelValMinBias_14TeV/CMSSW_12_0_0_pre4-120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v2-v1/GEN-SIM
                                           [3]: cmsDriver.py step3  -s RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,RECOSIM,PAT,NANO,VALIDATION:@standardValidation+@miniAODValidation,DQM:@standardDQM+@ExtraHLT+@miniAODDQM+@nanoAODDQM --conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic --datatier GEN-SIM-RECO,MINIAODSIM,NANOAODSIM,DQMIO -n 10 --eventcontent RECOSIM,MINIAODSIM,NANOEDMAODSIM,DQM --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3 --procModifiers seedingDeepCore --pileup Run3_Flat55To75_PoissonOOTPU --pileup_input das:/RelValMinBias_14TeV/CMSSW_12_0_0_pre4-120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v2-v1/GEN-SIM
                                           [4]: cmsDriver.py step4  -s HARVESTING:@standardValidation+@standardDQM+@ExtraHLT+@miniAODValidation+@miniAODDQM+@nanoAODDQM --conditions auto:phase1_2021_realistic --mc  --geometry DB:Extended --scenario pp --filetype DQM --era Run3 --procModifiers seedingDeepCore -n 10 --pileup Run3_Flat55To75_PoissonOOTPU --pileup_input das:/RelValMinBias_14TeV/CMSSW_12_0_0_pre4-120X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v2-v1/GEN-SIM
```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

FYI: @bouchamaouihichem @vmariani @slava77
title: `runTheMatrix`: fix DeepCore Seeding PU Workflows
